pr_title: remove metadata on entity death, and when items are removed from pede…

timeline.message: remove metadata on entity death, and when items are removed from pedestal. Also remove references to "item_placed" I do not see anywhere where this key is actually set, maybe leftover from old code?

timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: I could not find anywhere that this was actually added
replies.author: PhanaticD

replies.bodyText:
Hmm true. Weird...
Since there hasn't been any bug reports or complaints about the altars recently I will just assume that this is safe to remove, some probably added this at some point and removed it half-heartedly, leaving these things behind. Guess it wasn't that important then.
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit
